trans-unit.source: Provides a host for services.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en vert for tjenester.

trans-unit.source: Implements the host used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service model programming model.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer verten brukes av den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service modellen programming modellen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ServiceHost class to configure and expose a service for use by client applications when you are not using Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Activation Services (WAS) to expose a service.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ServiceHost klassen Konfigurer for å vise en tjeneste for bruk med klientprogrammer når du ikke bruker Internet Information Services (IIS) eller Windows-prosessaktivering (WAS) til å vise en tjeneste.

trans-unit.source: Both IIS and WAS interact with a ServiceHost object on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: Både IIS og WAS samhandler med et ServiceHost objekt på dine vegne.

trans-unit.source: To expose a service for use by callers, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] requires a complete service description (represented by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> class).
trans-unit.target: Vise en tjeneste for bruk av brukere, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] krever en fullstendig tjenestebeskrivelsen (representert av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>klassen).</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: The ServiceHost class creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> from the service type and configuration information and then uses that description to create <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> objects for each endpoint in the description.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ServiceHost oppretter en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>fra tjenesten typen og konfigurasjonen informasjonen og bruker beskrivelsen til å opprette <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>objekter for hvert endepunkt i beskrivelsen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: Use a ServiceHost object to load a service, configure endpoints, apply security settings, and start listeners to handle incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en ServiceHost-objektet til å laste inn en tjeneste, konfigurere endepunkt, bruker sikkerhetsinnstillingene og starte lyttere til å behandle innkommende forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: There are two constructors used to create an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> class.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes to konstruktører som brukes til å opprette en forekomst av <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>klassen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Use the [ServiceHost(Type, Uri\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.#ctor(System.Type,System.Uri[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) constructor which takes the service type as an input parameter, most of the time.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av [ServiceHost (Type, Uri\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.#ctor(System.Type,System.Uri[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) konstruktør som tar tjenestetypen som inndataparameter, vanligvis.

trans-unit.source: The host can use this to create new services as needed.
trans-unit.target: Verten kan bruke dette til å opprette nye tjenester etter behov.

trans-unit.source: Use the [ServiceHost(Object, Uri\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.#ctor(System.Object,System.Uri[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) constructor instead only when you want the service host to use a specific singleton instance of the service.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av [ServiceHost (objektet, Uri\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.#ctor(System.Object,System.Uri[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) konstruktøren i stedet bare når du ønsker Tjenesteverten å bruke en bestemt singleton-forekomsten av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> class with the instance of the service and its base addresses specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"> </xref> klasse forekomsten av tjenesten og base adressene angitt.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor as an alternative to implementing a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName> when you want to provide a specific object instance for use by a singleton service.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren som et alternativ til å implementere egendefinerte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>Når du vil angi en bestemt objektforekomst for bruk av en singleton-tjeneste.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You may want to use this overload when your service implementation type is difficult to construct (for example, if it does not implement a default public constructor that has no parameters).
trans-unit.target: Du bør bruke denne overlasten når service-Implementeringstypen er vanskelig å konstruere (for eksempel hvis den ikke har implementert en standard offentlig konstruktør som ikke har parametere).

trans-unit.source: Note that when an object is provided to this overload, some features related to the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] instancing behavior work differently.
trans-unit.target: Merk at når et objekt som er angitt for denne overlasten, noen funksjoner knyttet til den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] instancing virkemåte for arbeid på en annen måte.

trans-unit.source: For example, calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext.ReleaseServiceInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> have no effect when a well-known object instance is provided using this constructor overload.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kaller <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext.ReleaseServiceInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>har ingen effekt når en velkjente objektforekomst er angitt med denne konstruktøren overlasten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext.ReleaseServiceInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, any other instance release mechanism is ignored.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte blir annen forekomsten utgaven måte ignorert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> always behaves as if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode?displayProperty=fullName> for all operations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>alltid virker som om det <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode?displayProperty=fullName>for alle operasjoner.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: The instance of the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av tjenesten vertsbaserte.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Uri> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Array>av typen <xref:System.Uri>som inneholder base-adresser for tjenesten vertsbaserte.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: singletonInstance is .
trans-unit.target: singletonInstanceis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> class with the type of service and its base addresses specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"> </xref> klasse tjenesten og base adressene angitt.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you have the service type and you can create new instances of it when needed, even when you need a singleton instance.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren når du har tjenestetypen og du kan opprette nye forekomster av den ved behov, selv når du trenger en singleton-forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Use the [ServiceHost(Object, Uri\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.#ctor(System.Object,System.Uri[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) constructor instead only when you want the service host to use a specific singleton instance of the service.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av [ServiceHost (objektet, Uri\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.#ctor(System.Object,System.Uri[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) konstruktøren i stedet bare når du ønsker Tjenesteverten å bruke en bestemt singleton-forekomsten av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The type of hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestetype vertsbaserte.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Uri> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Uri>som inneholder base-adresser for tjenesten vertsbaserte.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the hosted service with a specified contract, binding, and endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en serviceendepunktet vertsbaserte tjenesten med en angitt kontrakten binding og Endepunktadressen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>kontrakten for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Adressen for sluttpunktet legges til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> added to the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>legges til i tjenesten vertsbaserte.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: implementedContract or binding or
trans-unit.target: implementedContractor binding or

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the hosted service with a specified contract, binding, and URI that contains the endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en serviceendepunktet vertsbaserte tjenesten med en angitt kontrakten binding og URI som inneholder Endepunktsadressen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>kontrakten for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that contains the address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>som inneholder adressen for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> added to the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>legges til i tjenesten vertsbaserte.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: implementedContract or binding or
trans-unit.target: implementedContractor binding or

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the hosted service with a specified contract, binding, an endpoint address, and a URI on which the service listens.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en serviceendepunktet vertsbaserte tjenesten med en angitt kontrakt, bindingen, en Endepunktadressen og en URI som tjenesten lytter.

trans-unit.source: Use this version of the method when you have multiple endpoints that need to listen on the same, specified URI.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne versjonen av metoden når du har flere endepunkter trenger for å lytte på den samme angitt URI.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>kontrakten for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint address for the service.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktsadressen for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> on which the service endpoints can listen.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>på tjenesten endepunktene kan lytte.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> added to the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>legges til i tjenesten vertsbaserte.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: implementedContract or binding or
trans-unit.target: implementedContractor binding or

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the hosted service with a specified contract, binding, a URI that contains the endpoint address, and a URI on which the service listens.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en serviceendepunktet vertsbaserte tjenesten med en angitt kontrakt, bindingen, en URI som inneholder Endepunktsadressen og en URI som tjenesten lytter.

trans-unit.source: Use this version of the method when you have multiple endpoints that need to listen on the same, specified URI.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne versjonen av metoden når du har flere endepunkter trenger for å lytte på den samme angitt URI.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>kontrakten for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that contains the address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>som inneholder adressen for sluttpunktet legges til.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> on which the service endpoints can listen.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>på tjenesten endepunktene kan lytte.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> added to the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>legges til i tjenesten vertsbaserte.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.target: implementedContractor binding or

trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The contracts are not initialized or the contract keys cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Kontraktene er ikke initialisert, eller kontrakten nøklene finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Loads the service description from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime being constructed.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tjenestebeskrivelsen fra konfigurasjonsfilen og gjelder for kjøretiden blir opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a description of the service hosted.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en beskrivelse av tjenesten vert.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to construct contract descriptions from customized programming models.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å konstruere kontrakten beskrivelser fra tilpassede programming modeller.

trans-unit.source: Override the corresponding base class method, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.CreateDescription%28System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%7BSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription%7D%40%29>, to implement the customized model.
trans-unit.target: Overstyre metoden tilsvarende basisklassen <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.CreateDescription%28System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%7BSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription%7D%40%29>, for å implementere egendefinerte modellen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.CreateDescription%28System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%7BSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription%7D%40%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> with key pairs of type (<xref:System.String>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>) that contains the keyed-contracts of the hosted service that have been implemented.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> nøkkelpar av typen (<xref:System.String>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>) som inneholder rettet-kontraktene for vertsbasert tjenesten som er implementert.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref> for vertsbasert tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The type of service hosted is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestetypen vertsbaserte er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a description of the service hosted based on its instance and specified base addresses.
trans-unit.target: Starter en beskrivelse av tjenesten vertsbaserte basert på forekomsten og angitt basere adresser.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Forekomsten av tjenesten vertsbaserte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.UriSchemeKeyedCollection"></xref> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.UriSchemeKeyedCollection"> </xref> som inneholder base-adresser for vertsbasert-tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: singletonInstance is .
trans-unit.target: singletonInstanceis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a description of the service hosted based on its type and specified base addresses.
trans-unit.target: Starter en beskrivelse av tjenesten vertsbaserte basert på filtypen og angitt basere adresser.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of service hosted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>for tjenesten vertsbaserte.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.UriSchemeKeyedCollection"></xref> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.UriSchemeKeyedCollection"> </xref> som inneholder base-adresser for vertsbasert-tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Disposes of disposable services that are being hosted when the service host is closed.
trans-unit.target: Disposes disponible Services som vert når Tjenesteverten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the OnClosed method you must ensure the base.OnClosed method is called, even if an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrer OnClosed-metoden må du kontrollere grunntallet. OnClosed metoden kalles, selv om det oppstår et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to do this.
trans-unit.target: Følgende koden viser hvordan du gjør dette.

trans-unit.source: Gets the singleton instance of the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: Henter singleton-forekomsten av tjenesten vertsbaserte.

trans-unit.source: Use the [ServiceHost(Object, Uri\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.#ctor(System.Object,System.Uri[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) constructor to initialize a singleton instance of the service to be hosted when you want to control the instance of the service that is used.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av [ServiceHost (objektet, Uri\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.#ctor(System.Object,System.Uri[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) konstruktøren for å initialisere en singleton-forekomsten av tjenesten ligger når du vil kontrollere forekomsten av tjenesten som er brukt.

trans-unit.source: The hosted service object.
trans-unit.target: Vertsbaserte serviceobjekt.
